2048.description: Get the highest score on this amazing puzzle game

panda_play_pad.instructions: Mouse to play, click the blocks.
panda_play_pad.description: A panda is playing on his pad, a fun puzzle game. Combine as many of the same fruit blocks to score points (match 3 minimum). Special blocks will appear to help you. Unlimited levels, just do not let the blocks reach the top. A challenging and addictive game for all ages.
panda_play_pad.name: Panda Play Pad
panda_play_pad.author: Nowgamez.com

ninja_panda_couple.instructions: Use arrow keys and asdw to move
ninja_panda_couple.description: Can you beat this training course and become a full fledged ninja panda either on 1 player or on a 2 player mode with your panda wife Addictive, fun platformer everyone can enjoy.
ninja_panda_couple.name: Ninja Panda Couple
ninja_panda_couple.author: 5games.com

3_pandas_brazil.instructions: Use the mouse to move the pandas through each level.
3_pandas_brazil.description: The crazy 3 pandas are back and making their escape once again! They were captured by a poacher but escaped his trap and landed in Brazil!! They love Brazil but have never been there so it is all new fun for them. These adventurous Pandas are in for a lots of fun new tricks and new obstacles!
3_pandas_brazil.name: 3 Pandas Brazil
3_pandas_brazil.author: Slix media

fancy_pandas.description:
Pandas need to stick together. Try to gather them in this clever physics game and use the objects wisely to do so.
Have Fun!
fancy_pandas.name: Fancy Pandas
fancy_pandas.author: Kaiser-Games-GmbH

unperfect.description: A platform game telling a story about father-son relationship. Be a hero for your hero!
unperfect.name: UNPerfect
unperfect.author: Timefall Games

princess_garment_factory.description: The princess is going to go to the party, come for the princess make beautiful dress, who made the most beautiful dress.
princess_garment_factory.name: Princess Garment Factory
princess_garment_factory.author: Ptfgame.com

around_the_world.instructions:
Accelerate - Up or W key.
Reverse - Down or S key.
Balance Left/Right - A/D or Left/Right arrow keys respectively.
Jump - Spacebar.
Turbo - Shift key.
around_the_world.description: Around The World is a driving game.  The aim of the game is to drive through increasingly difficult locales, climbing up steep hills and sudden drops, collecting coins along the way! Use the coins to upgrade your car, making it easier to traverse the dangerous terrain.  Some advice from us: take advantage of your boost to make those more difficult jumps!
around_the_world.name: Around The World
around_the_world.author: Free Online Games

girl_for_party.description:
This girl is reade for party.She looks sweet and adorable.
With colorful dresses and new hair styles and accessories, Can you make her look even prettier
girl_for_party.name: Girl For Party
girl_for_party.author: Gamezstar.com

chunky_monkey_pancakes.description: Hello ladies! Its high time that we learnt how to prepare my favorite recipe from back when I was a little girl. This delicious recipe is called Chunky Monkey Pancakes. You will see that the preparation of preparation of this yummy recipe is going to be a real piece of cake if you will follow all of the steps that you will be indicated. Have a fantastic time playing this really delicious cooking game called Chunky Monkey Pancakes!
chunky_monkey_pancakes.name: Chunky Monkey Pancakes
chunky_monkey_pancakes.author: CuteZee

prison_van_rush.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive.
prison_van_rush.description: Drive the prison van as fast as you can, before the time runs out. Pick up power ups along the way that will improve your health, protect you with a shield, give you extra speed and bonus points. Your score is the sum of the points gathered during the level and the time bonus. Avoid crashing into other cars because you may damage your van. There are eight amazing levels that you have to complete in order to win the game. Submit your score and compare it with your friends. Have fun!
prison_van_rush.name: Prison Van Rush
prison_van_rush.author: Idea Studios

can_fighters.instructions: LEFT ARROW key for player two.
can_fighters.description: Street Fighter with two kids and a can, play vs the computer or with a friend
can_fighters.name: Can Fighters
can_fighters.author: 2pg.com

scoobys_cream_cheese_sugar_cookies.description: Hello friends! In this really exciting cooking game that we have prepared for you, called Scoobys Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies, you are going to have the opportunity to learn how to prepare a brand new recipe. We know how much you love Scooby, and that is why he will be the one who is going to teach you how to prepare the delicious cream cheese sugar cookies. Have fun, kids!
scoobys_cream_cheese_sugar_cookies.name: Scoobys Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies
scoobys_cream_cheese_sugar_cookies.author: CuteZee

wedding_lily.description: Lily is back! The popular lily series created by KaiserGames continues, this time it is all about wedding. Create the most beautiful and cute bride the world has ever seen. Again, you have numerous styling possibilties, so you can create the Wedding Lily you desire!
wedding_lily.name: Wedding Lily
wedding_lily.author: Kaiser-Games-GmbH

spicy_pecan_popcorn_chicken.description: These spicy pecan chicken nuggets are to be tasted with creamy ranch dip. Enjoy the cooking game!
spicy_pecan_popcorn_chicken.name: Spicy Pecan Popcorn Chicken
spicy_pecan_popcorn_chicken.author: Flobzoo.com

the_final_stand.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive and the space bar to brake.
the_final_stand.description: Drive the police car and search all the mobsters in the city. When you find them, destroy their cars by crashing your own vehicle into them. Use your arrow keys to drive and the space bar to brake and be sure to pick up all the power ups along the way. Destroy all your targets before the time runs out if you want to move on to the next level. Have a blast!
the_final_stand.name: The Final Stand
the_final_stand.author: Idea Studios

bizarrerie_hunter.description: This is a special puzzle game ,Players need to eliminate all obstacles,But dont be hit,good luck.
bizarrerie_hunter.name: Bizarrerie Hunter

angry_gran_toss.instructions:
Mouse to aim and launch.
Mouse to fire gun
Space bar to activate Jetpack
angry_gran_toss.description: Angry Gran has been imprisoned in the Angry Asylum and must free herself by launching over the wall and fly away with Cannons, Jet Packs and Guns. How far can you toss gran
angry_gran_toss.name: Angry Gran Toss
angry_gran_toss.author: Box10.com

classy_room_escape.instructions: Click on the objects to add them to the inventory panel. Combine the objects in the inventory panel. Use them to open the door.
classy_room_escape.description: This is the most amazing room you have ever been to but eventually you are bored staying here for more than an hour. When you try to leave the room you find yourself locked inside this room. Find a way to escape out of this room.
classy_room_escape.name: Classy Room Escape
classy_room_escape.author: Yotreat.com

teddy_bear_picnic_massacre.description: If you go down to the woods to the woods today youre in for a big surprise. This Teddy Bear Picnic is turning into a Teddy Bear Picnic Massacre. One teddy is sick of a teddys cuddly image and wants to get rid of all things nice! YOU are that teddy bear! With his gun locked and loaded, wipe out all of the teddies. Open presents to use different guns, while earning XP to level up and increase Damage, Health and Ammo Capacity.
teddy_bear_picnic_massacre.name: Teddy Bear Picnic Massacre
teddy_bear_picnic_massacre.author: Box10.com

last_resistance.instructions:
Gameplay:

Collect resources for your High Score by shoot down the UFOs.
You need Resources for your bullets otherwise its over.
Every round increased the number of UFOs.
You get damage when a UFO attacked you and the vehicle conditions is going down. (0 = game over)
You have assistants and they can repair you, when you stand by them for 5 seconds.
If a UFO attacked your assistants, they lose morale and the Human Resistance is going down. You lost your assistans when the Human Resistance reached 0.
You get bonus resources and morale when you make a 5x, 10x, 15x, 20x or 25x combo. So you can get new assistants, push the Human Resistance and make more resources for your High Score.







Controls:

Move your vehicle with your mouse.
Shoot with Left-Click.
Pause with P or B
Quit with Q or E (Abort the round)
Press and hold ctrl or Spacebar to view the options.
last_resistance.description:
Fight our last battle and defend the humanity against the alien invaders. Classic arcade gameplay




Story:

For decades we have been looking for intelligent life on other planets. But then it found us first!
Thus began a bitter war between aliens and humans for power over resources, research units and the sheer survival of their civilization. It turned out that the invaders were more intelligent than hoped for and so they took after a short time the upper hand in the battle for the planet and its inhabitants.
Nevertheless, there is a small group of survivors who called themselves Last Resistance and they doesnt given up. You are the vehicle commander of this group and responsible for the defense of the presumably last stand against the prevailing aliens. While there are a few brave people who are actively assist you in the defense, but secretly everyone is clear about one thing: This fight is hopeless!
Scouts have reported that several UFOs have already set a course to the camp and they will arrive shortly. Stand up for a hard and bitter fight. He will grant no breaks, and only ends when the last defense collapses.


Unlockable Contents:

You can unlock 3 simple Standard skins, 1 new vehicle and a new difficulty mode.
Look at the category Unlock Progress for more informations about it.
Hardcore mode:
You earn significantly more resources.
You suffer significantly more damage.
More enemies.
last_resistance.name: Last Resistance
last_resistance.author: AOFD - art of flash designs

3d_pipe_racing.instructions: Arrow keys to drive, see in game instructions.
3d_pipe_racing.description:
Race with a space ship through tunnels. Avoid all the obstacles and try to complete all the 25 levels. Buy upgrades for better handling and a better shield etc.
A futuristic racing game, each level will become more difficult to complete.
3d_pipe_racing.name: 3D Pipe Racing
3d_pipe_racing.author: Nowgamez.com

troublemaker.description: squirrels are so cute but they can be annoying if they start to walk around on your clothes line. You must fall down the clothing to win the stage without getting catched by the ennemies.
troublemaker.name: Troublemaker
troublemaker.author: Flobzoo.com

rush_rider.instructions: Use your arrow keys to ride.
rush_rider.description: In this new Jeep adventure game you need to drive to the other side of the city. But on your way you will see that the city is not the same anymore!
rush_rider.name: Rush Rider
rush_rider.author: Frontgamers.com

blizzard_racing_hazard.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive the car and your space bar to brake.
blizzard_racing_hazard.description: A dangerous blizzard has come your way while you were driving your car and now you have to get at the end facing a lot of challenges. Thunders and snowflakes will give you reduced visibility and you will have to be careful not to crash into other cars because the health of your car is limited. You need to get at the end of the level before the time runs out in order to successfully complete it. Have a lot of fun!
blizzard_racing_hazard.name: Blizzard Racing Hazard
blizzard_racing_hazard.author: Idea Studios

moonlight_monster_truck.description: Its night and you are out for a mission with your Monster Truck, make sure you will survive the darkness! Let your friends see who is the best on this epic and darkness road!
moonlight_monster_truck.name: Moonlight Monster Truck
moonlight_monster_truck.author: Frontgamers.com

bank_robbers.instructions: Use your WASD keys to drive and your mouse to aim and shoot.
bank_robbers.description: Enjoy an epic storyline and a very fun gameplay in this amazing new game! Your goal is to rob banks from three different cities and escape the police by shooting down their cars and destroying them. As you progress in the game things will become more challenging, the police will upgrade their cars and even the FBI will step in, but you can also buy new cool vehicles for yourself and upgrade them and your weapons so you can perform better. Enjoy this incredible game!
bank_robbers.name: Bank Robbers
bank_robbers.author: Idea Studios

monster_truck_taxi.description: Ride your way through these courses and get your passenger to her destination by any means possible!
monster_truck_taxi.name: Monster Truck Taxi
monster_truck_taxi.author: Box10.com

shameless_clone_2_player.instructions: Mouse to move player 1 hero. WASD or ARROWS to control player 2 hero. SPACE to activate ultimate power. P or ESC to pause game.
shameless_clone_2_player.description: Pick heroes and destroy imaginative worlds. Insane gameplay. Polished oldschool graphics. Swarms of enemies and tons of bonuses. Upgrade your heroes. Choose between 1 player or 2 players
shameless_clone_2_player.name: Shameless Clone 2 player
shameless_clone_2_player.author: 5games.com

krusty_in_vegas.instructions: Use Arrow Keys to drive the Krusty bike.
krusty_in_vegas.description: Take Krusty on a drive thru Las Vegas and finish as fast you can this 5 level race game with your buddy Krusty the clown!
krusty_in_vegas.name: Krusty In Vegas
krusty_in_vegas.author: Frontgamers.com

snoopys_rainbow_clown_cake.description: Hello ladies! Its time for another one of our really exciting recipes! In our brand new game called Snoopys Rainbow Clown Cake, you are going to have the opportunity to learn how to prepare a delicious and beautifully colored recipe. Im sure that you are going to simply adore playing this fantastic cooking game because the chef will be adorable little Snoopy. The first thing that you will have to do in order to get started on the preparation of the delicious rainbow clown cake is make sure that you do have all the necessary ingredients. Once you will have completed this stage, you will then be able to move on, and get to the preparation itself. You shouldnt worry that the preparation of the rainbow clown cake will be difficult because Snoopy will be guiding you every step of the way and if you will need his help, he will assist you. Just make sure to follow all the instructions in this really fun cooking game called Snoopys Rainbow Clown Cake, and in the end you will be able to enjoy the most delicious recipe ever! Have a fantastic time playing this fun cooking game called Snoopys Rainbow Clown Cake and learning how to prepare this delicious recipe!
snoopys_rainbow_clown_cake.name: Snoopys Rainbow Clown Cake
snoopys_rainbow_clown_cake.author: CuteZee

big_burger_cooking.instructions: This game is played with mouse only.
big_burger_cooking.description: There are many ingredients which you can use when you want to prepare a burger, but to make it delicious you will have to know how to combine them. So take different ingredients, mozzarella, baked rolls, cheese and other yummy ingredients and mix them in the right way in order to create the most delicious big burger you can!
big_burger_cooking.name: Big Burger Cooking
big_burger_cooking.author: Smileycooking

right_hand.instructions:
Use your mouse to play.
NOTE: This game requires wmode = direct to play! Check the html file for embed code!

http://www.box10.com/downloads/righthand.zip
right_hand.description: Rescue your kidnapped wife in this shooting point and click adventure. Make your way through the kidnappers house and other levels taking out all the bad guys buy any means. Remember to pick up the health packs on your way as you WILL need them.
right_hand.name: Right Hand
right_hand.author: Box10.com

space_crane_parking.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive, your space bar to brake, your QETY keys to control the crane and your mouse for the mini-game.
space_crane_parking.description: You are on your way to explore some foreign planets in a new solar system and you have to use your crane to pick up samples. Always watch your time and complete your mission before it runs out and be careful not to crash, or you might destroy your vehicle. After collecting the items, you will have to sort them in specific jars in a very fun mini-game. It is also your chance to get more points for your score. Have a wonderful time!q
space_crane_parking.name: Space Crane Parking
space_crane_parking.author: Idea Studios

food_revolution.instructions: This game is played with mouse only.
food_revolution.description: The fries are done and the burgers are hot..that can only mean one thing..its time for the food revolution! Join Gizmo the hungry dinosaur on his epic food quest in this addicting fun game. Gizmo is a little different from your average dinosaur..he doesnt like to hunt his food but prefers a good old fashion meal. The path to a healthy meal is not an easy one because Gizmo will have to pass through many obstacles and enemies to reach his goal. He is determined to reach the top or starve trying! Dont forget a healthy diet features a lot of fruits so be sure that Gizmo collects the apples and the other healthy fruits, they will give him the extra boost he needs. If you are a dinosaur loving, food enthusiast and love adventure you will feel just right helping out Gizmo. With your help he will be enjoying his meal soon and the food revolution will come to an end.
food_revolution.name: Food Revolution
food_revolution.author: Smileycooking

daisy_escape_play_school_fun.instructions: Use mouse clicks to open things and activate them. Observe the needs of the atmosphere, collect hints and activate actions to move over to forthcoming scenes. Earn some really high scores if you proceeded really fast.
daisy_escape_play_school_fun.description: The little girl is really enthusiastic about making it to school, so do a good deed by helping her prepare for it. Have fun in arranging the toys, packing books and food, having breakfast and other activities that might brighten her day.
daisy_escape_play_school_fun.name: Daisy Escape Play School Fun
daisy_escape_play_school_fun.author: Yotreat.com

turtle_brownies.description: This chocolaty brownies topped with caramel and nuts bring together the classic components of turtle candies. We are sure you will appreciate that cooking game!
turtle_brownies.name: Turtle Brownies
turtle_brownies.author: Flobzoo.com

frisky_pet_care.instructions:
Use mouse to drag and drop the food which will be in front of the
screen to the pets. Feed them all before the loader present
ahead of the pets get reduced completely or you will loose your
valuable points.
frisky_pet_care.description:
Make your sweet cute pets that playing in the domesticated
garden, more exuberant by dropping them their wishing stuff
quickly before they worn out and have fun.
frisky_pet_care.name: Frisky Pet Care
frisky_pet_care.author: Fabsys

cute_butterfly_fairy.instructions: Use your mouse to play the game.
cute_butterfly_fairy.description: Dress a butterfly fairy with many options. This fairy can fly really well because the wings are on top.
cute_butterfly_fairy.name: Cute Butterfly Fairy
cute_butterfly_fairy.author: Yokogames.com

f1_pit_stop_mania.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive, your X key to use nitro and your Z key to refill your fuel.
f1_pit_stop_mania.description: Take part in an amazing F1 racing competition and try to be the first one to cross the finish line! Your fuel level will go down as you progress in the race, so you will be required to park at the pit stop and refill your gas tank. During the race you can also use nitro power to get you ahead of the competition. The nitro level is limited, but will regenerate when you are not using it. Between levels you can upgrade your car. Have  a great time!
f1_pit_stop_mania.name: F1 Pit Stop Mania
f1_pit_stop_mania.author: Idea Studios

neon_drive_2.instructions: Arrow keys to drive and balance.
neon_drive_2.description: Ride the neon bikes in complete neon themed levels. Experience the thrilling neon ride with fast bikes, but watch out for the obstacles and drive carefully.
neon_drive_2.name: Neon Drive 2
neon_drive_2.author: Nowgamez.com

all_alone_home_escape.instructions: Look around the rooms and collect objects that might help your escape, in the inventory. Use them deftly and exit successfully.
all_alone_home_escape.description: After hours of reading and playing at home, a fresh air walk is great but the main door is locked. Escape smartly and enjoy the thumping excitement as you effort to succeed.
all_alone_home_escape.name: All Alone Home Escape
all_alone_home_escape.author: Yotreat.com

hello_kittys_chocchip_jelly_muffins.description: Welcome to the wonderful kitchen of Hello Kitty where the little kitten can make all sorts of wonderful and yummy recipes. Today, Hello Kitty is having dinner with some friends and as a desert, she is thinking about making her all time favorite Choc-Chip Jelly Muffins. And because she is in a great hurry, Hello Kitty would be very grateful if you could give her a hand with the recipe. Have fun!
hello_kittys_chocchip_jelly_muffins.name: Hello Kittys ChocChip Jelly Muffins
hello_kittys_chocchip_jelly_muffins.author: CuteZee

celebrity_facialist.description: Come and join the staff of the health and beauty salon. You must take care of celebrities by giving them the best facial treatments.
celebrity_facialist.name: Celebrity Facialist
celebrity_facialist.author: Flobzoo.com

draw_gems.instructions: Use the mouse to draw the gems.
draw_gems.description: A new unique gameplay, draw gems in all kinds of sizes and match 3 of the same color to score points. Watch out that you do not overload it with too big gems. The bigger gems you combine the more points you can score. How many points can you score within the given time
draw_gems.name: Draw Gems
draw_gems.author: Nowgamez.com

bedroom_breakout.instructions: Consume the objects around you and perform the necessary actions with them to escape out of this room.
bedroom_breakout.description: Unfortunately you got locked inside your bedroom. The door is locked from outside with the key still on it. Find a way to reach the key and get out of your bed room.
bedroom_breakout.name: Bedroom Breakout
bedroom_breakout.author: Yotreat.com

raelum_skywatchers.instructions: Mouse to play, see in game instructions.
raelum_skywatchers.description:
Fly like no cat has ever flown before in this exhilarating cannonball flight game. Can you help our hero achieve the ranks of a Raelum Skywatcher Show off your love for kitties and physics through fun-filled stages in the game.
Raelum, a distant planet civilized by cats, is facing a crisis! Guide Taron through his flight-filled journey to find his father and save his planet!
There are many equipments and upgrades available to try out. Be sure to unlock all achievements.
raelum_skywatchers.name: Raelum Skywatchers
raelum_skywatchers.author: Nowgamez.com

monster_truck_race.instructions: Use the arrow keys to play this game.
monster_truck_race.description: Racing games can be lot of fun, especially when you get to drive big Monster Trucks like this. Join the race and drive as good as you can in order to collect points and win this Monster racing championship.
monster_truck_race.name: Monster Truck Race
monster_truck_race.author: Smileycooking

miss_popularity_competition_prep.description: Miss Popularity Competition is finally here. For weeks, you have been trying to gather as many votes as possible to win this competition and tonight is the big night in which you will find out if your efforts really paid off, or not. You are confident that you will win, but you still have to make sure that the way you look will exceed peoples expectations and will leave the others amazed. In order for you to prepare for this unique event, you were thinking about doing a full makeover, and you have planned this makeover in two steps. The first step will be a facial treatment in which you will only use the best products there are on the market, after which your skin will be looking healthy and radiant. After you have finished with the facial treatment, you can then go on to doing your makeup. You dont want to look like youve just awaken, but you also dont want to wear too much makeup. The makeup being ready, you can now finally select your hairstyle and dress. The dress you will be wearing in this competition must be extravagant, but comfortable. Enjoy playing this brand new game!
miss_popularity_competition_prep.name: Miss Popularity Competition Prep
miss_popularity_competition_prep.author: CuteZee

santa_velvet_cupcakes.description: Christmas is here again! It is a magical time when everybody meets with each other gives and receives presents. It is also when everybody spends a lovely time singing carols, waiting for Santa Claus and gathers around the table to taste all the goodies that were made with so much care. This year, the Christmas dinner is organized at your house and among so many yummy recipes you want to make some delicious Santa velvet cupcakes
santa_velvet_cupcakes.name: Santa Velvet Cupcakes
santa_velvet_cupcakes.author: CuteZee

winter_parking_havoc.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive and your space bar to brake.
winter_parking_havoc.description: Face the challenges of winter and drive your car on snow and ice in order to get to your parking space. You have a lot of obstacles on your way and you may find that is a little harder to drive on ice. Try to complete each level before the time runs out and don’t crash your vehicle, because it may get damaged. There are eight amazing levels for you to try out. Prove you are a great driver in any weather and have a blast!
winter_parking_havoc.name: Winter Parking Havoc
winter_parking_havoc.author: Idea Studios

police_monster_truck.instructions: Arrow keys to drive and balance.
police_monster_truck.description: Drive this Police Monster Truck and crush some cars! Collect the coins and complete all levels as quickly as you can. Do not crash your Police Monster Truck.
police_monster_truck.name: Police Monster Truck
police_monster_truck.author: Nowgamez.com

diego_sand_race.instructions: Use the arrow keys to play this game.
diego_sand_race.description: Time to prove that you have some driving skills in a new racing challenge. Lets go with Diego and his boogie car on a desert race. Pass all the levels, collect all the points you can and in this way you will surely win the desert race. Good Luck!
diego_sand_race.name: Diego Sand Race
diego_sand_race.author: Smileycooking

route_66_escape.description: Route 66 Escape is a new racing game with as main goal to collect as much oil cans as you can! The story is that a Huge oil truck has lost his oil loading, and you are the person to help him out. So you should collect all the oil cans and bring it back to Mister Trucker! Good luck and dont forget youre getting not much time for it!
route_66_escape.name: Route 66 Escape
route_66_escape.author: Frontgamers.com

blondie_lockes_gingerbread_bears.description: Blondie runs a school blog and today she wants to share a new recipe on her blog with her readers: Blondie Lockes Gingerbread Bears. She wants to cook this tasty dessert and take a lot of pictures so she can explain the cooking process much better to her readers. Will you help her with the cooking process
blondie_lockes_gingerbread_bears.name: Blondie Lockes Gingerbread Bears
blondie_lockes_gingerbread_bears.author: CuteZee

chicago_skyscrapers_racing.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive and your X key to activate nitro power.
chicago_skyscrapers_racing.description: Do you have the courage to race your car on top of Chicagos tallest buildings Then take your chances in this incredible new game! You will have to drive very fast and try to keep your balance, collect coins to improve your score or nitro power ups if you want to use your speed boost. There are eight incredible levels to play and a lot of fun to be had. Enjoy playing Chicago Skyscrapers Racing!
chicago_skyscrapers_racing.name: Chicago Skyscrapers Racing
chicago_skyscrapers_racing.author: Idea Studios

taxi_rush_2.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive.
taxi_rush_2.description: Drive a taxi very fast and try to reach the finish line before the time expires. The traffic on the road will make things a little bit challenging, but if you have some good driving skills you can surely handle it. Pick power ups along the way that will help you increase your health, protect you against crashes or give you extra speed. Do not hit other cars or run people over. There are eight exciting levels available for you to play. Have a blast!
taxi_rush_2.name: Taxi Rush 2
taxi_rush_2.author: Idea Studios

bomb_squad_parking.instructions: Use your arrow keys to drive and your space bar to park.
bomb_squad_parking.description: This is a great new parking game in which you are part of the bomb squad trying to dismantle bombs and save the city. Use your parking skills to park the car before the time runs out and without crashing it, but you also have an awesome mini-game which you will have to solve fast, otherwise the bomb will explode. The levels will become more challenging as you progress in the game. Have a blast!
bomb_squad_parking.name: Bomb Squad Parking
bomb_squad_parking.author: Idea Studios

hungry_insects.instructions: Keyboard buttons 1, 2, 3, 4 for switching objects (or you can switch them with mouse left button), mouse for moving objects, and left mouse button for dropping objects.
hungry_insects.description: Physics puzzle game with 20 levels where you have to help hungry insects reach the food or bring the food to them. Actions takes place in a house hold environment so objects used are from the house.
hungry_insects.name: Hungry Insects
hungry_insects.author: Nowgamez.com

polar_bob.instructions:
Click to jump, click again for double jump.

For testing purpose, a cheat feature is enabled in this version.
polar_bob.description: Polar bear Bob is tired of walking on the ground and wants to reach unlimited heights. Help him jumping up the platforms and land carefully on each icy platform. Try to get high as possibel. Have fun!
polar_bob.name: Polar Bob
polar_bob.author: Kaiser-Games-GmbH

mutant_fighting_cup.description: Grow and mutate your animal to fight through the stages and become World Mutant Fighting Champion
mutant_fighting_cup.name: Mutant Fighting Cup
mutant_fighting_cup.author: Box10.com

double_cheeseburger_decorator.instructions: Use the mouse to make a delicious burger.
double_cheeseburger_decorator.description: We are going to make this giant cheeseburger with all of our favorite toppings. Let’s pick out a tasty bun and the kind of cheeses we like. Then we can enjoy our creation!
double_cheeseburger_decorator.name: Double Cheeseburger Decorator
double_cheeseburger_decorator.author: Zopt.com
